question: Where is the headquarters of the World Customs Organization (WCO) located?
explanation:
The International Customs Day is celebrated every year on January 26 across the world, led by the World Customs Organization (WCO).
It was earlier called as the Customs Cooperation Council (CCC). The Day has been celebrated since 1983. This year the theme is ‘Customs bolstering Recovery, Renewal and Resilience for a sustainable supply chain’
